con:method.name: getUserNotificationInfo
con:method.con:description: Takes a userId and returns back the name and email that should be used when sending email notifications to that user. There are places where HaaS needs to obtain the name & email of a `userId` but we don't have a `principalId` present.

con:parameter.con:name: x-fapi-interaction-id
con:parameter.con:description: An [RFC4122](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4122) UUID used as a correlation id. If provided, the data holder must play back this value in the x-fapi-interaction-id response header. If not provided a [RFC4122](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4122) UUID value is required to be provided in the response header to track the interaction.

con:parameter.con:name: x-haas-realm-name
con:parameter.con:description: The name of the realm that data is being requested for. Necessary for holders that have multiple brands that should not share data between them.

con:parameter.con:name: x-haas-performance-tier
con:parameter.con:description: This indicates which performance tier according to the Data Standards the request originates

con:representation.con:description: This resource does not exist in the upstream system
